heroInfo.description: Aspiring Frontend Engineer passionate about building interactive and responsive web applications. Currently in my final year of B.Tech, gaining real-world experience through an internship in UI/UX development.

listOfAchievements.text: Received the “Best Mini Project” award in the 5th semester for developing a weather forecasting app using React, Tailwind CSS, and OpenWeatherMap API.
Won 1st place in a college-level Frontend Development Hackathon by building a real-time event management dashboard using React and Firebase.
Completed the “Meta Front-End Developer” professional certification on Coursera, covering topics like React, version control, testing, and accessibility.

projects.headline1: Enhancing the UI/UX of Zomato's web platform.
projects.headline2: Improved page load speed by 30% using lazy loading & code splitting.
projects.skills: React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Web Performance Optimization

qualifications.headline2: Won 1st place in the inter-school coding competition.
